mapper.select: SELECT BASECONFIGIDX as IDX,GUBN,CONFIGCODE,CONFIGVALUE,CONFIGSUMMARY,CONFIGSTATUS,u.USERNAME,TO_CHAR(b.REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REGDATE FROM BASECONFIG b LEFT OUTER JOIN USERINFO u ON b.REGDWUSERIDX = u.USERIDX

select BASECONFIGIDX as IDX,GUBN,CONFIGCODE,CONFIGVALUE,CONFIGSUMMARY,CONFIGSTATUS,u.USERNAME,TO_CHAR(b.REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REGDATE FROM BASECONFIG b LEFT OUTER JOIN USERINFO u ON b.REGDWUSERIDX = u.USERIDX WHERE 1=1
and GUBN = #{gubun}
and CONFIGCODE like '%' || #{textval} || '%'
and CONFIGVALUE like '%' || #{textval} || '%'

select BASECONFIGIDX as IDX,GUBN,CONFIGCODE,CONFIGVALUE,CONFIGSUMMARY,CONFIGSTATUS,b.REGDATE,u.USERID FROM BASECONFIG b LEFT OUTER JOIN USERINFO u ON b.REGDWUSERIDX = u.USERIDX where BASECONFIGIDX = #{idx}
